metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0826 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: libcameraservice in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.x before5.1.1 LMY49H, and 6.x before 2016-03-01 does not require use of theICameraService::dump method for a camera service dump, which allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application that directly dumps,as demonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access, akainternal bug 26265403.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
